original_text: Delilah did this while Samson was asleep. She took the seven tails of his hair and she tied them into the cloth on the loom. She fixed them with a strong peg. Then she shouted, ‘Samson, the Philistines are here!’ He woke up and he pulled out the peg. He tore his hair away from the cloth on the loom so that he was free.
korean_text: 들릴라가 바디로 그 머리털을 단단히 짜고 그에게 이르되 삼손이여 블레셋 사람들이 당신에게 들이닥쳤느니라 하니 삼손이 잠을 깨어 베틀의 바디와 날실을 다 빼내니라

sentences.original_text: Delilah did this while Samson was asleep
sentences.korean_translation: 들릴라는 삼손이 잠든 동안 이렇게 했다

sentences.original_text: She took the seven tails of his hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그의 머리카락 일곱 가닥을 가져왔다

sentences.original_text: and she tied them into the cloth on the loom
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 베틀에 있는 천에 묶었다

sentences.original_text: She fixed them with a strong peg
and he pulled out the peg
He tore his hair away from the cloth on the loom
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 베틀에 있는 천에서 자신의 머리카락을 뽑아냈다
